p: A549 cells (2.0 × 10 4) were seeded in each well of 96-well flat bottom plates and incubated at 37 °C in 5% CO 2 overnight. Thereafter, the media were removed, and cells were infected with HAdV-3 or HAdV-7 (low MOI = 25 VPs/cell, or high MOI = 250 VPs/cell). Infected and uninfected cell viability were assayed at 2, 4, 24, 36, 48 and 60 h post-infection and the absorbance was determined as described [ 20, 21]. Cell viability was expressed as the ratio, and the mean (mean ± SEM) of 5 replicates of two strains was presented.
